String.string: [Apex] Impending Doom
"Okay. Thanks for the advice."
Ask Fabavan about Verdas. [You can enter the quest location via Bellenun, who’s next to {@linkcreature:63#1009#Adela}.]
"Velika is in grave danger!"
"I'll take care of the dragons myself, then."
"You have to trust me!"
Speak to Cerenon. [You can enter the quest location via Bellenun, who’s next to {@linkcreature:63#1009#Adela}.]
"Fine. I guess I'll just have to hurry."
"I'll kill some of the green dracoloths."
"I'll kill some of the red dracoloths."
Speak to Cerenon. [You can enter the quest location via Bellenun, who’s next to {@linkcreature:63#1009#Adela}.]
"I've got this."
Defeat the dracoloths. [You can enter the quest location via Bellenun, who’s next to {@linkcreature:63#1009#Adela}.]
Defeat the red dracoloths. [You can enter the quest location via Bellenun, who’s next to {@linkcreature:63#1009#Adela}.]
The Wrecked Wagon
That must be Geiran's supply wagon.
Protect the soldiers located near the destroyed wagon. [You can enter the quest location via Bellenun, who’s next to {@linkcreature:63#1009#Adela}.]
"Geiran? Oh. He's gone."
Speak with Geiran. [You can enter the quest location via Bellenun, who’s next to {@linkcreature:63#1009#Adela}.]
"Yes, I've seen one...recently."
"You've seen it, too?"
"Sounds like the one I'm looking for."
Talk to Verdas. [You can enter the quest location via Bellenun, who’s next to {@linkcreature:63#1009#Adela}.]
"I'm going to kill it."
Where the Black Dragon Soars
The Black Dragon appears high in the sky.
Go to the Black Dragon’s Lair. You’ll find dragons and suspects there. [You can enter the quest location via Bellenun, who’s next to {@linkcreature:63#1009#Adela}.]
Where the Black Dragon Soared
The Black Dragon vanished!
Go to the Black Dragon’s Lair, where you’ll find the Black Dragon and Vergos cultists. [You can enter the quest location via Bellenun, who’s next to {@linkcreature:63#1009#Adela}.]
"It's not important. Let's go!"
"Vergos was the first dragon."
"Yes, it does. How about you?"
Talk to Verdas. [You can enter the quest location via Bellenun, who’s next to {@linkcreature:63#1009#Adela}.]
"I agree. Let's go."
Wyrmgorge Entrance
Investigate the strange plant.
Go to the Wyrmgorge entrance. [You can enter the quest location via Bellenun, who’s next to {@linkcreature:63#1009#Adela}.]
Strange Plant
The plant suddenly begins thrashing frantically!
Approach the strange plant with Verdas. [You can enter the quest location via Bellenun, who’s next to {@linkcreature:63#1009#Adela}.]
Defeat the dracoloth and the strange plant. [You can enter the quest location via Bellenun, who’s next to {@linkcreature:63#1009#Adela}.]
"Was the Plant warning us to stay away?"
"Maybe it's some kind of a trap."
"Doesn't matter. Let's just kill the plants."
Talk to Verdas. [You can enter the quest location via Bellenun, who’s next to {@linkcreature:63#1009#Adela}.]
"That makes sense."
Wyrmgorge Entrance
The strange plant begins thrashing wildly!
Approach the entrance to the Wyrmgorge where the suspicious plants are. [You can enter the quest location via Bellenun, who’s next to {@linkcreature:63#1009#Adela}.]
Defeat the dracoloths and the strange plant. [You can enter the quest location via Bellenun, who’s next to {@linkcreature:63#1009#Adela}.]
"Okay. Let's go."
Talk to Verdas. [You can enter the quest location via Bellenun, who’s next to {@linkcreature:63#1009#Adela}.]
Inner Gorge
It's a Vergos cultist!
Go deeper into the Wyrmgorge. [You can enter the quest location via Bellenun, who’s next to {@linkcreature:63#1009#Adela}.]
Defeat the Vergos cultists. [You can enter the quest location via Bellenun, who’s next to {@linkcreature:63#1009#Adela}.]
Defeat the summoned dragon. [You can enter the quest location via Bellenun, who’s next to {@linkcreature:63#1009#Adela}.]
Temporary Gorge Camp Approach
It's the same person who attacked Velik!
Find the Vergos cultist.
"They want to take over the world."
"They're planning to kill Velik."
"What does it look like to you?"
Talk to Verdas. [You can enter the quest location via Bellenun, who’s next to {@linkcreature:63#1009#Adela}.]
"I agree."
Temporary Gorge Camp
Dragons are swarming to the camp.
Go to the Firespine Outpost. [You can enter the quest location via Bellenun, who’s next to {@linkcreature:63#1009#Adela}.]
Temporary Gorge Camp Approach
All the garrison's soldiers are dead.
Go to the Firespine Outpost. [You can enter the quest location via Bellenun, who’s next to {@linkcreature:63#1009#Adela}.]
"He's gone."
Find and speak to the surviving soldier. [You can enter the quest location via Bellenun, who’s next to {@linkcreature:63#1009#Adela}.]
"Lead on."
Talk to Verdas. [You can enter the quest location via Bellenun, who’s next to {@linkcreature:63#1009#Adela}.]
The Plant-Lined Path
The path is lined with the strange plants.
Go to the Zaeltarazad Shrine. [You can enter the quest location via Bellenun, who’s next to {@linkcreature:63#1009#Adela}.]
"I'm ready when you are."
Talk to Verdas. [You can enter the quest location via Bellenun, who’s next to {@linkcreature:63#1009#Adela}.]
The Plant-Lined Path
That Vergos cultist is up ahead!
Go to the Zaeltarazad Shrine. [You can enter the quest location via Bellenun, who’s next to {@linkcreature:63#1009#Adela}.]
Zaeltarazad Shrine Approach
There are prisoners at the top of the hill.
Run to the top of the hill. [You can enter the quest location via Bellenun, who’s next to {@linkcreature:63#1009#Adela}.]
Defeat the dragon and free the soldiers from the cages. [You can enter the quest location via Bellenun, who’s next to {@linkcreature:63#1009#Adela}.]
"Consider it done."
Speak with the freed soldiers. [You can enter the quest location via Bellenun, who’s next to {@linkcreature:63#1009#Adela}.]
"What rumor?"
"But Vergos is dead."
Talk to Verdas. [You can enter the quest location via Bellenun, who’s next to {@linkcreature:63#1009#Adela}.]
"Okay. I'm on it."
Defeat the dragon and free the soldiers from the cages. [You can enter the quest location via Bellenun, who’s next to {@linkcreature:63#1009#Adela}.]
"Consider it done."
Speak with the freed soldiers. [You can enter the quest location via Bellenun, who’s next to {@linkcreature:63#1009#Adela}.]
Defeat the dragon and free the soldiers from the cages. [You can enter the quest location via Bellenun, who’s next to {@linkcreature:63#1009#Adela}.]
"It's okay. I'm here to help."
Rescue the imprisoned soldiers. [You can enter the quest location via Bellenun, who’s next to {@linkcreature:63#1009#Adela}.]
Where the suspicious cultist disappeared
Strike now, before she escapes!
Follow Verdas as he pursues the location of the Vergos cultists. [You can enter the quest location via Bellenun, who’s next to {@linkcreature:63#1009#Adela}.]
Defeat the Vergos cultists. [You can enter the quest location via Bellenun, who’s next to {@linkcreature:63#1009#Adela}.]
Examine the documents dropped by the Vergos cultists. [You can enter the quest location via Bellenun, who’s next to {@linkcreature:63#1009#Adela}.]
"So where are their troops?"
"We should help evacuate the village first."
"I don't know that I trust that device."
Talk to Verdas. [You can enter the quest location via Bellenun, who’s next to {@linkcreature:63#1009#Adela}.]
"Let's do this."
Use the unknown device to teleport. [You can enter the quest location via Bellenun, who’s next to {@linkcreature:63#1009#Adela}.]
This is Fyrmount!
Use the device to teleport.
"Let's get going."
Speak with Verdas.
